title: [Qiṣṣat Sindbād al-barrī]
description: A few leaves supplied in a later hand.
Fair modern (18th century?) naskhī, in red and black.
Islamic binding, paper covered, with flap.

abstract: The tale of Sindbād and his princely pupil, in colloquial Arabic.
